title: hey rito can i have a free name change
body:
i find name changes too expensive especially if you're a extreme casual
like me
pls

replies.body: It also depends on the rolls you get from the capsules lol. min is 720??? I think. max is 1260... so..... yeh gl.
name changes are free, they cost blue essences which are a currency you don't to spend real money for.

> [{quoted}](name=Canley Vale,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=At3jTGA1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-13T08:38:33.562+0000)
>
> name changes are free, they cost blue essences which are a currency you don't to spend real money for.

Lol only takes about 14 levels which is like 140 games.
i dont think i can do 140 games just for a name change
